item.title: The Best Of Hair with Adriana aka Alex Taylor
item.description: Adriana and I went to high school together, but after high school nobody really knew what became of her. Many classmates have always asked about her and wondered what became of little Adriana. It turns out that the person I went to school with, became a dancer, a Penthouse super model, a featured entertainer in Las Vegas, and became a Vivid Girl starring in a few classic porn videos. It's amazing where our lives will take us, and I want to thank Adriana for sharing her story. Named Miss Hampton Beach in 1984, Adriana took a path less traveled, but nevertheless it brought her national fame and super stardom. The Argentina native not only went on to win Miss New Hampshire in 1991, but also became a well-known adult entertainment performer known as Alex Taylor. Taylor was named Penthouse Pet of the Month in 1994, and appeared in the magazine more than 30 times. From 1998 to 2004, she worked for Vivid Entertainment as an adult actress, starring in such films as the adult classic "Where the Boys Aren't 12." She has since retired from the industry and resides in Orlando, Fla.
item.dc:creator: DJ Ravenwolf
item.itunes:summary:
Adriana and I went to high school together, but after high school nobody really knew what became of her. Many classmates have always asked about her and wondered what became of little Adriana. It's amazing where our lives will take us, and I want to thank Adriana for sharing her story. Named Miss Hampton Beach in 1984, Adriana took a path less traveled, but nevertheless it brought her national fame and super stardom. The Argentina native not only went on to win Miss New Hampshire in 1991, but also became a well-known adult entertainment performer known as Alex Taylor. Taylor was named Penthouse Pet of the Month in 1994, and appeared in the magazine more than 30 times.
From 1998 to 2004, she worked for Vivid Entertainment as an adult actress, starring in such films as the adult classic "Where the Boys Aren't 12." She has since retired from the industry and resides in Orlando, Fla.

item.title: The Best Of Hair with DJ Ravenwolf and special guest Hayden Black (video)
item.description: Hayden Black is an English comedian and writer best known for critical and commercial comedy Internet hits Goodnight Burbank and Abigail’s Teen Diary. Black left a career as an on-air promo producer for the networks to form his own production company Haydenism Inc. Since forming in 2005 he has created, written and acted in some of the most popular shows the web has seen. The Guardian calls him “one of Internet comedy’s brightest stars”. His first show, Goodnight Burbank, has picked up numerous awards and nominations and has been called a “wicked satire, bracingly funny… competitive with the very best that networks have to offer” by the LA Times and “one of my favorite shows” by the Wall Sreet Journal’s Walt Mossberg. In 2007 Black launched Abi’s Teen Diary (also known as Abigail’s X-Rated Teen Diary) about a 13 year old girl with a fictional genetic condition that gives her the appearance of a man in his thirties. It too was nominated for awards and was called "silly, funny & sometimes poignant" by the Manchester Evening News and "cutting-edge comedy" by Fortune magazine. In 2009, Black created a six-part comedy for Babelgum.com called The Occulterers. A comedy-horror, it co-starred Black alongside Ellen Sandweiss (The Evil Dead), James C. Leary (Buffy), and Camden Toy (Buffy/Angel). He also shot a pilot for The Cabonauts, a sci-fi musical comedy co-starring Star Trek’s Nichelle Nichols. Black released the first-ever half-hour comedy created for the internet in April 2011 in the form of a rebooted Goodnight Burbank. Along with Black it co-stars Laura Silverman, Dominic Monaghan, Miracle Laurie and John Barrowman. Goodnight Burbank made IMDB's Top 50 TV series to premiere in 2011

His first show, Goodnight Burbank, has picked up numerous awards and nominations and has been called a “wicked satire, bracingly funny… competitive with the very best that networks have to offer” by the LA Times and “one of my favorite shows” by the Wall Sreet Journal’s Walt Mossberg.
In 2007 Black launched Abi’s Teen Diary (also known as Abigail’s X-Rated Teen Diary) about a 13 year old girl with a fictional genetic condition that gives her the appearance of a man in his thirties. It too was nominated for awards and was called "silly, funny & sometimes poignant" by the Manchester Evening News and "cutting-edge comedy" by Fortune magazine.
In 2009, Black created a six-part comedy for Babelgum.com called The Occulterers. A comedy-horror, it co-starred Black alongside Ellen Sandweiss (The Evil Dead), James C. Leary (Buffy), and Camden Toy (Buffy/Angel). He also shot a pilot for The Cabonauts, a sci-fi musical comedy co-starring Star Trek’s Nichelle Nichols.
Black released the first-ever half-hour comedy created for the internet in April 2011 in the form of a rebooted Goodnight Burbank. Along with Black it co-stars Laura Silverman, Dominic Monaghan, Miracle Laurie and John Barrowman.
Goodnight Burbank made IMDB's Top 50 TV series to premiere in 2011

item.title: The Best Of Hair with DJ Ravenwolf and special guest, Kurt Kelly
item.description: DJ Ravenwolf interviewed Kurt Kelly in the 90 minute interview discussed Kelly's career in entertainment http://www.kurtkelly.com. Spanning from age 10, Kelly has consulted and worked with the likes from the Rolling Stones to the White House! http://www.facebook.com/kurtkellyvoiceover?sk=info Kurt Kelly "The Voice Of Experience" © SM, TM is known for his amazing career in radio, television, film, the executive corporate worlds and beyond for his skills as talent and management. http://www.facebook.com/1KurtKelly This original show featuring Kurt Kelly with DJ Ravenwolf Aired Live on Monday, July 18, 2011 2:07 PM, on KLEO TV and KCLA-FM - FM 99.3 ; and also was televised Live on www.thebestofhairradio.com KCLA FM Los Angeles.

item.title: The Best Of Hair with DJ Ravenwolf and special guest Codey Deal!
item.description: Cody Deal plays the title role as the Norse God of Thunder, ‘Thor’, in the upcoming SyFy Original television movie, ALMIGHTY THOR, which debuts on April 21, 2011, followed by an international video release the following week. It’s an origin story centered around Cody’s character, ‘Thor’, where the young hero must battle the villainous ‘Loki’ (played by Richard Grieco) before he destroys the world of men and gods. The film also stars Patricia Velasquez (The Mummy) as the demigoddess ‘Jarnsaxa’ who is Thor’s love interest; Kevin Nash (former TNA Wrestler) plays Thor’s father, ‘Odin’. Immediately following his superhero role in ALMIGHTY THOR, Cody switches sides to play the super villain, ‘Mark HardOn’, in the Comedy/Action feature film SUPERSEEDS. It is a film flowing in the vein of recent successes such as SUPERBAD, HAROLD AND KUMAR, and KICK ASS. He recently wrapped a supporting role as a motorcycle cop who pulls over Amanda Righetti (The Mentalist) and Jonathan Bennett (Van Wilder: Freshman Year) in the film CATS JUMPING ON JUPITER. His other credits include roles in the HANGOVER and GET HIM TO THE GREEK. He has appeared on THE VIEW, THE TODAY SHOW, and Criss Angel’s MINDFREAK.
item.dc:creator: DJ Ravenwolf

Cody Deal plays the title role as the Norse God of Thunder, ‘Thor’, in the upcoming SyFy Original television movie, ALMIGHTY THOR, which debuts on April 21, 2011, followed by an international video release the following week. It’s an origin story centered around Cody’s character, ‘Thor’, where the young hero must battle the villainous ‘Loki’ (played by Richard Grieco) before he destroys the world of men and gods. The film also stars Patricia Velasquez (The Mummy) as the demigoddess ‘Jarnsaxa’ who is Thor’s love interest; Kevin Nash (former TNA Wrestler) plays Thor’s father, ‘Odin’.
Immediately following his superhero role in ALMIGHTY THOR, Cody switches sides to play the super villain, ‘Mark HardOn’, in the Comedy/Action feature film SUPERSEEDS. It is a film flowing in the vein of recent successes such as SUPERBAD, HAROLD AND KUMAR, and KICK ASS. He recently wrapped a supporting role as a motorcycle cop who pulls over Amanda Righetti (The Mentalist) and Jonathan Bennett (Van Wilder: Freshman Year) in the film CATS JUMPING ON JUPITER. His other credits include roles in the HANGOVER and GET HIM TO THE GREEK. He has appeared on THE VIEW, THE TODAY SHOW, and Criss Angel’s MINDFREAK.

item.title: The Best Of Hair with DJ Ravenwolf and special guest YES guitarist, Billy Sherwood
item.description: YES are an English progressive rock band formed in London in 1968, generally regarded as one of the archetypal bands and pioneers of the genre. Despite many lineup changes, occasional splits within the group, and the ever-changing trends in popular music, the band have continued for more than 40 years and still retain a large following. They have sold over 30 million albums. The band's music blends symphonic and other "classical" structures with their own brand of rock music. Although the band's sole consistent member has been bass player Chris Squire, Yes are also generally noted for the distinctive high-register vocals of former lead singer Jon Anderson and the eclectic musical stylings of a succession of guitarists (Steve Howe, Peter Banks, Trevor Rabin, Billy Sherwood), keyboard players (Rick Wakeman, Tony Kaye, Patrick Moraz, Geoff Downes, Igor Khoroshev, Oliver Wakeman), and drummers (Alan White and Bill Bruford). Several band members became celebrated musicians and/or bandleaders in their own right, and a 1980 lineup of the band was briefly fronted by Trevor Horn (shortly before he became one of rock music's most celebrated record producers). The band's current lineup are Squire, Howe, White, Oliver Wakeman (keyboards) and Benoît David (lead vocals)
item.dc:creator: DJ Ravenwolf
item.itunes:summary:
YES are an English progressive rock band formed in London in 1968, generally regarded as one of the archetypal bands and pioneers of the genre. Despite many lineup changes, occasional splits within the group, and the ever-changing trends in popular music, the band have continued for more than 40 years and still retain a large following. They have sold over 30 million albums. The band's music blends symphonic and other "classical" structures with their own brand of rock music.
Although the band's sole consistent member has been bass player Chris Squire, Yes are also generally noted for the distinctive high-register vocals of former lead singer Jon Anderson and the eclectic musical stylings of a succession of guitarists (Steve Howe, Peter Banks, Trevor Rabin, Billy Sherwood), keyboard players (Rick Wakeman, Tony Kaye, Patrick Moraz, Geoff Downes, Igor Khoroshev, Oliver Wakeman), and drummers (Alan White and Bill Bruford). Several band members became celebrated musicians and/or bandleaders in their own right, and a 1980 lineup of the band was briefly fronted by Trevor Horn (shortly before he became one of rock music's most celebrated record producers). The band's current lineup are Squire, Howe, White, Oliver Wakeman (keyboards) and Benoît David (lead vocals)

item.title: The Best Of Hair with DJ Ravenwolf and special guest STEVE TYLER!
item.description: This years new panel of judges, includes singer/actress, Jennifer Lopez, and Aerosmith frontman, Steven Tyler. Steve calls The Best Of Hair from New York to answer a few questions about this years American Idol and what he will bring to the table as a judge and a veteran rocker. ~Enjoy! Tune in to American Idol on FOX. Check your local listings for times.

item.title: The Best Of Hair with DJ Ravenwolf and special guests The Pink Cross Foundation
item.description: One woman's mission to pull herself up out of the gutter that is the porn industry has become a never ending battle. She will march through the gates of hell to help other young men and women who continue to walk in darkness and believe that there is no other way until somebody shows them the light. Shelley Lubben started The Pink Cross Foundation, has helped many men and women turn their lives around when perhaps nobody would have given any of them a second chance. Even some churches today are full of predators and depraved minds.. so where is one to go? Who do you trust? Who can you tell your story to without the fear of being judged or ridiculed? The team at The Pinkcross Foundation! Visit them today at http://www.thepinkcross.org If you're looking to give to a worthy organization that is actually doing somethign to change lives, PLEASE give to The Pinkcross Foundation and let them know you care. ~Enjoy.

~Enjoy.

item.title: The Best Of Hair with DJ Ravenwolf and special guest, Leisa Balfour
item.description: Leisa is a fashion designer for many big name musicians such as Prince, LL Cool J, Ice T, and Michael Jackson, just to name a few. Her work caught the attention of the industry when she designed clothes for Michael Jackson's video SCREAM. Leisa sits down with DJ Ravenwolf to discuss her career and give a little glimpse into her world. ~Enjoy!

item.title: The Best Of Hair with special guest Whitney Perry
item.description: Whitney Perry returns to the show to help promote an amazing charity, Tuesdays Children (http://www.tuesdayschildren.org) and to announce for the very first time on my show - HER NEW JEWELRY LINE called, "Sugar" by Whitney Perry which you will be able to find at http://www.thejewelrybox.me Please visit Tuesdays Children's website and donate whatever you can. if you can't give, then PLEASE copy and past the web address to your twitter, facebook, myspace or other social network to help bring support for this worth while organization. Thanks! DJ Ravenwolf

item.title: DJ Ravenwolf being interviewed Xmas 1968
item.description: My mom sent me some reel to reel tapes to convert to cd. One of the tapes is from Xmas 1968, I was almost 3 years old. My grand father had the mic and decided to try and interview me. I couldn't talk much back then but it was great to hear this. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: DJ Ravenwolf
item.itunes:summary:
My mom sent me some reel to reel tapes to convert to cd. One of the tapes is from Xmas 1968, I was almost 3 years old. My grand father had the mic and decided to try and interview me. I couldn't talk much back then but it was great to hear this.
Enjoy!

item.title: The Best Of Hair with Special Guest: Oz Fox of Stryper.
item.description: One of my favorite Christian metal bands, STRYPER, is celebrating their 25th anniversary with a new tour and a new album called Murder By Pride. It's been an amazing 25 years with a lot of ups, and a lot of downs. Success can sometimes come with a heavy price, but when it comes to these four guys, faith in Christ has seen them through the worst of times. Thanks to Oz for coming on the show and special thanks to the guys in Stryper for the amazing tunes and teaching us that Christian music doesn't have to be boring! ~Enjoy! www.thebestofhair.net www.dubli.com/9271080

item.title: Former Adult Film Star Jersey Jaxin returns to The Best Of Hair!
item.description: It's been almost a year since I spoke with Jersey, (Tanya), and since that time she has gotten her life back and has made a clean break from the porn industry. Hear how she's been able to cope and gives a few insights into the adult film industry. She's a great girl and I'm proud of her for sticking to her guns. You can see more of Tanya at www.myspace.com/jerseyjaxin

item.title: The Best Of Hair with Special Guest: TRIXTER!
item.description: Steve Brown, guitarist for the 80's hair band TRIXTER, joins DJ Ravenwolf for a trip down memory lane. With great tunes like Give It To Me Good and Surrender, Trixter has stood the test of time and are still touring across the United States and enjoying the fans, old and new, who still know what it means to rock out and have FUN! Don't forget to check out www.thebestofhair.net for more great stuff!

item.title: The Best Of Hair with special guests: WARRANT!!
item.description: Jerry Dixon chats with DJ Ravenwolf about the band then and now. The exit of Jani Lane and the blessing of the new singer Robert Mason. I met with Jerry Dixon at the Rainbow Room after the interview where he and Robert signed my guitar which will be auctioned off on April 4th to benefit the Make A Wish Foundation. Michael Anthony of Van Halen will also be signing it. If you'd like to know more about the auction, contact me at www.thebestofhair.net Thanks Jerry! ~Enjoy! DJ Ravenwolf - The Best Of Hair Fridays 10am PT/1pm ET www.kclafm.com www.thebestofhair.net

item.title: The Best Of Hair with Film star Rena Riffel
item.description: Rena Riffel joins DJ Ravenwolf on The Best Of Hair to talk about her upcoming horror film, DARK REEL (in theaters March 10th). Rena is probably best known for her role as Penny/Hope in MGM's cult classic Showgirls starring alongside Elizabeth Berkly. She has also appeared in Strip Tease with Demi Moor and has been on a host of television series (The Pretender, Lands End, etc.) ~Enjoy!

item.title: Annie Lobert Interview
item.description: Annie Lobert was once a high dollar callgirl in Las Vegas for many years before a drug ove dose actually killed her and when she was brought back to life in the hospital she gave her life to God and has now made her mission to save the souls of other young women out on the strip. Annie has been on the 700 club, and on tons of Christian television shows sharing her testimony and I was fortunate enough to have her on my show. Listen to her story and be encouraged, then visit her on www.myspace.com/annielobert and give her some love and tell her you heard her story on The Best Of Hair. ~Enjoy

item.title: Former Adult film Star, Jersey Jaxin Interview
item.description: While the porn world knows her as Jersey Jaxin, this amazing woman wants everyone to know her by her real name Tanya. After leaving the porn industry thanks to Shelley Lubben, Tanya is turning her life around and agreed to come on my show and share her story with everyone. Having doen over 1,000 adult films, magazines, adult websites, and was a part of the Tom Sizemore (Saving Private Ryan) sex tape scandal, Tanya speaks freely and openly about what the sex industry is like, what it did to her and how she got out. PLEASE support my friend Shelley Lubben's ministry that without her, girls like Tanya may not be here today. You can do your part by going to her webpage at www.shelleylubben.com and tell her you heard about her on The Best Of Hair! If you would like to say hello to Tanya or just give her some love, you can visit her on myspace at www.myspace.com/jerseyjaxin and tell her you heard about her on The Best Of Hair. Be encouraged and enjoy!
